articles.description: Apple may have at long last discontinued the iPod, but the “pod” lives on. The iPod played a crucial role in the development of digital audio, but podcasting has outlived — and outgrown — its namesake.
articles.content:
How the podcast outlived and outgrew its namesake
The back of a seventh-generation iPod Nano.
Photo: Sean OKane
This story is part of a group of stories called
